Question: Should patients with RA initiating MTX receive oral MTX or subcutaneous (SC) MTX?

Explanations.a: The study did not report on whether allocation was concealed.
Explanations.b: Downgraded by one level due to serious imprecision. Confidence intervals includes both values suggesting no effect and values suggesting benefit.

References.1: Braun J. Comparison of the clinical efficacy and safety of subcutaneous versus oral administration of methotrexate in patients with active rheumatoid arthritis: results of a six-month, multicenter, randomized, double-blind, controlled, phase IV trial. Arthritis & Rheumatism. 2008;58(1):73.
